snippet: The idea that weapons make women and homes safer is wrong. The opposite is true.
abstract: Editorial disputes notion that proposed ban on assault rifles and high-capacity magazines would disproportionately hurt vulnerable women and their children, idea brought up in Senate hearings by Gayle Trotter, fellow at right-wing public policy group Independent Women's Forum; contends such misguided notion should not be allowed to block new gun controls that country so obviously needs (Series: The Gun Challenge).
lead_paragraph: The idea that weapons make women and homes safer is wrong. The opposite is true.
